alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 7:38AM CST until February 04 at 12:25AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Hunt, Kaufman and Rockwall Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 4.5 feet Wednesday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
